---
resourceName: Pro Bono Ontario
eligibility: Must be a resident of Ontario
serviceDescription: Pro Bono Ontario provides a wide range of legal information,
  resources and services for people in Ontario. If you cannot afford a lawyer,
  you can use the Free Legal Advice Hotline for up to 30 minutes of free legal
  advice and assistance.
website: https://www.probonoontario.org/hotline/
phone: 1-855-255-7256
logo: data:image/jpeg;base64,
resourceType: Community Organization
service:
  - Free Consultation
location:
  - Ontario-wide
cost: Free
---
